question: What is the name of the traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan?
asked_question_translated: Kako se imenuje tradicionalni vrt v mestu Kanazawa na Japonskem, ki je znan kot eden od treh velikih japonskih vrtov?
answer: Tradicionalni vrt v mestu Kanazawa na Japonskem, znan kot eden od treh velikih japonskih vrtov, se imenuje Kenroku-en.
answer_translated_eng: A traditional garden in Kanazawa, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan, is called Kenroku-en.
